<<<<<<< HEAD
By the King, a proclamation for the better ordering of those who repair to the court for their cure of the disease called the Kings-evil England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II) Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
1 broadside.
Printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker ..., London : 1662.
"Given at our court of Hampton-Court the fourth day of July 1662, in the fourteenth year of our reign." Reproduction of the original in the Huntington Library.
=======
By the King, a proclamation for the better ordering of those who repair to the court for their cure of the disease called the Kings-evil England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II) Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
1 broadside.
Printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker ..., London : 1662.
"Given at our court of Hampton-Court the fourth day of July 1662, in the fourteenth year of our reign." Reproduction of the original in the Huntington Library.
